source.name: Ragas
source.description: A list of Ragas (a.k.a. Raags or Ragams) in Indian Classical Music, which is broadly categorized as Hindusthani and Carnatic Classical Music.  This database will tend to use more Hindusthani than Carnatic terms, since I have learnt more about Hindusthani music, particularly in the Patiala Gharana style of late.  Please note this disclaimer: There are subtle differences between Carnatic and Hindusthani and in some cases, even between different Gharanas within Hindusthani music itself for some Ragas.
